tha-ap85:1.1_0: But the root of a tree,
tha-ap85:2.1_0: out of compassion for living creatures,
tha-ap85:2.4_0: having raising his joined palms to him.
tha-ap85:3.2_0: the most excellent of all beings,
tha-ap85:4.2_0: to bow to the supreme among men.
tha-ap85:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap85:4.4_0: And this is the fruit and result.
tha-ap85:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap85:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Nādika.
tha-ap85:8.1_0: For the senior mendicants who were lying down; they was a third part.
